# Redoc project generator

This is simple tool for creating a [Redoc](https://github.com/Redocly/redoc) project and can work smoothly with [Redocly](https://redocly.com/docs/cli).

The idea is very basic:
* Create a redoc project based on OpenAPI specification.
* Run, manage project with Redocly.
* Track changes from OpenAPI then update the project.

Versions tested:
* Redocly CE (community edition) version ``1.12.2``
* OpenAPI version ``3``
